subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Playing in her backyard tournament for the first time since 2009, the five-time champion Serena Williams beat the wild card Zhang Shuai at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: Playing in her backyard tournament for the first time since 2009, the five-time champion Serena Williams beat the wild card Zhang Shuai at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla.
